plugin-info.description: This plugin adds merge check to Bitbucket, ensuring that branch names adhere to the required format for Jira integration. It enforces the presence of a valid Jira ticket in branch names before allowing merges into the main branch.

repository-merge-check.name: Jira ticket reference in branch name
repository-merge-check.description: Enforces that source branch name must have a Jira key references before it can be merged.

config-form.name: Jira ticket reference in branch name config
